anya-e0102n7:2_1: Etasseva pana nāmarūpassa paccayapariggahaṇena tīsu addhāsu kaṅkhaṁ vitaritvā ṭhitaṁ ñāṇaṁ kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhi nāma.
anya-e0102n7:3_0: Taṁ sampādetukāmo bhikkhu yathā nāma kusalo bhisakko rogaṁ disvā tassa samuṭṭhānaṁ pariyesati.
anya-e0102n7:3_1: Yathā vā pana anukampako puriso daharaṁ kumāraṁ mandaṁ uttānaseyyakaṁ rathikāya nipannaṁ disvā “kassa
anya-e0102n7:3_2: nu kho ayaṁ puttako”ti tassa mātāpitaro āvajjati,
anya-e0102n7:4_0: So āditova iti paṭisañcikkhati “na tāvidhaṁ nāmarūpaṁ ahetukaṁ,
anya-e0102n7:5_1: So evaṁ nāmarūpassa hetupaccaye āvajjetvā imassa tāva rūpakāyassa evaṁ hetupaccaye pariggaṇhāti –
anya-e0102n7:5_2: “ayaṁ kāyo nibbattamāno neva uppalapadumapuṇḍarīkasogandhikādīnaṁ abbhantare nibbattati,
anya-e0102n7:5_4: atha kho āmāsayapakkāsayānaṁ antare udarapaṭalaṁ pacchato piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṁ purato katvā antaantaguṇaparivārito
anya-e0102n7:5_7: Tassevaṁ nibbattamānassa ‘avijjā taṇhā upādānaṁ kamma’nti ime cattāro dhammā nibbattakattā hetu,
anya-e0102n7:5_8: āhāro upatthambhakattā paccayoti pañca dhammā hetupaccayā honti.
anya-e0102n7:5_9: Tesupi avijjādayo tayo imassa kāyassa mātā viya dārakassa upanissayā honti.
anya-e0102n7:5_13: puna “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”ntiādinā nayena nāmakāyassa paccayapariggahaṁ karoti.
anya-e0102n7:6_0: So evaṁ paccayato nāmarūpassa pavattiṁ disvā yathā idaṁ etarahi,
anya-e0102n7:7_1: Tassevaṁ samanupassato yā sā pubbantaṁ ārabbha “ahosiṁ nu kho ahaṁ atītamaddhānaṁ,
anya-e0102n7:7_5: kiṁ hutvā kiṁ ahosiṁ nu kho ahaṁ atītamaddhāna”nti pañcavidhā vicikicchā vuttā,
anya-e0102n7:7_6: yāpi aparantaṁ ārabbha “bhavissāmi nu kho ahaṁ anāgatamaddhānaṁ,
anya-e0102n7:7_10: kiṁ hutvā kiṁ bhavissāmi nu kho ahaṁ anāgatamaddhāna”nti pañcavidhā vicikicchā vuttā,
anya-e0102n7:7_11: yāpi paccuppannaṁ ārabbha “etarahi vā pana paccuppannaṁ addhānaṁ ajjhattaṁ kathaṁkathī hoti –
anya-e0102n7:7_16: ayaṁ nu kho satto kuto āgato,
anya-e0102n7:7_17: so kuhiṁ gāmī bhavissatī”ti chabbidhā vicikicchā vuttā,
anya-e0102n7:8_1: Aparo sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇavasena duvidhaṁ nāmassa paccayaṁ passati,
anya-e0102n7:8_3: Duvidho hi nāmassa paccayo sādhāraṇo asādhāraṇo ca.
anya-e0102n7:8_5: rūpādīni cha ārammaṇāni nāmassa sādhāraṇo paccayo,
anya-e0102n7:9_0: Rūpassa pana kammaṁ cittaṁ utu āhāroti ayaṁ kammādiko catubbidho paccayo.
anya-e0102n7:9_1: Tattha kammaṁ atītameva kammasamuṭṭhānassa rūpassa paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n7:10_0: So evaṁ paccayato nāmarūpassa pavattiṁ disvā yathā idaṁ etarahi,
anya-e0102n7:10_3: Tassevaṁ samanupassato vuttanayeneva tīsupi addhāsu vicikicchā pahīyati.
anya-e0102n7:11_1: Aparo tesaṁyeva nāmarūpasaṅkhātānaṁ saṅkhārānaṁ jarāpattiṁ jiṇṇānañca bhaṅgaṁ disvā idaṁ saṅkhārānaṁ jarāmaraṇaṁ nāma jātiyā sati hoti,
anya-e0102n7:11_11: saṅkhārā avijjāya satīti evaṁ paṭilomapaṭiccasamuppādavasena nāmarūpassa paccayapariggahaṁ karoti.
anya-e0102n7:12_1: Aparo “iti kho avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti pubbe vitthāretvā dassitaanulomapaṭiccasamuppādavaseneva nāmarūpassa paccayapariggahaṁ karoti.
anya-e0102n7:13_5: cetanā bhavoti ime pañca dhammā purimakammabhavasmiṁ idha paṭisandhiyā paccayā,
anya-e0102n7:13_10: vedayitaṁ vedanāti ime pañca dhammā idhūpapattibhavasmiṁ purekatassa kammassa paccayā.
anya-e0102n7:13_12: cetanā bhavoti ime pañca dhammā idha kammabhavasmiṁ āyatiṁ paṭisandhiyā paccayā”ti evaṁ kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭavasena
anya-e0102n7:14_6: Tesu ekajavanavīthiyaṁ sattasu cittesu kusalā vā akusalā vā paṭhamajavanacetanā diṭṭhidhammavedanīyakammaṁ nāma.
anya-e0102n7:14_10: natthi kammavipāko”ti imassa tikassa vasena ahosikammaṁ nāma hoti.
anya-e0102n7:14_13: Tathā asakkontaṁ vuttanayeneva ahosikammaṁ nāma hoti.
anya-e0102n7:14_14: Ubhinnaṁ antare pañca javanacetanā aparāpariyavedanīyakammaṁ nāma.
anya-e0102n7:14_17: Sati saṁsārappavattiyā ahosikammaṁ nāma na hoti.
anya-e0102n7:15_6: Tattha kusalaṁ vā hotu akusalaṁ vā,
anya-e0102n7:15_7: garukāgarukesu yaṁ garukaṁ mātughātādikammaṁ vā mahaggatakammaṁ vā,
anya-e0102n7:15_9: Tathā bahulābahulesupi yaṁ bahulaṁ hoti susīlyaṁ vā dussīlyaṁ vā,
anya-e0102n7:15_14: Etehi pana tīhi muttaṁ punappunaṁ laddhāsevanaṁ kaṭattā vā pana kammaṁ nāma hoti,
anya-e0102n7:16_5: Tattha janakaṁ nāma kusalampi hoti akusalampi.
anya-e0102n7:16_7: Upatthambhakaṁ pana vipākaṁ janetuṁ na sakkoti,
anya-e0102n7:16_8: aññena kammena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā janite vipāke uppajjamānakasukhadukkhaṁ upatthambheti,
anya-e0102n7:16_10: Upapīḷakaṁ aññena kammena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā janite vipāke uppajjamānakasukhadukkhaṁ pīḷeti bādhati,
anya-e0102n7:16_12: Upaghātakaṁ pana sayaṁ kusalampi akusalampi samānaṁ aññaṁ dubbalakammaṁ ghātetvā tassa vipākaṁ paṭibāhitvā attano vipākassa okāsaṁ karoti.
anya-e0102n7:16_13: Evaṁ pana kammena kate okāse taṁ vipākaṁ uppannaṁ nāma vuccati.
anya-e0102n7:17_0: Iti imesaṁ dvādasannaṁ kammānaṁ kammantarañceva vipākantarañca buddhānaṁ kammavipākañāṇasseva yāthāvasarasato pākaṭaṁ hoti,
anya-e0102n7:17_2: Vipassakena pana kammantarañca vipākantarañca ekadesato jānitabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n7:18_1: Iti imaṁ dvādasavidhaṁ kammaṁ kammavaṭṭe pakkhipitvā evaṁ eko kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭavasena nāmarūpassa paccayapariggahaṁ karoti.
anya-e0102n7:18_2: So evaṁ kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭavasena paccayato nāmarūpassa pavattiṁ disvā “yathā idaṁ etarahi,
anya-e0102n7:18_3: evaṁ atītepi addhāne kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭavasena paccayato pavattittha,
anya-e0102n7:20_0: Kammā punabbhavo hoti, evaṁ loko pavattatīti. –
anya-e0102n7:21_1: Tassevaṁ samanupassato yā sā pubbantādayo ārabbha “ahosiṁ nu kho aha”ntiādinā nayena vuttā soḷasavidhā vicikicchā,
anya-e0102n7:21_4: So neva kāraṇato uddhaṁ kārakaṁ passati,
anya-e0102n7:21_7: vipākappavattiyā sati “paṭisaṁvedako”ti samaññāmattena paṇḍitā voharanticcevassa sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n7:32_0: Taṇhāsotena vuyhantā, na te dukkhā pamuccare.
anya-e0102n7:35_0: “Kammaṁ natthi vipākamhi, pāko kamme na vijjati;
anya-e0102n7:36_0: Aññamaññaṁ ubho suññā, na ca kammaṁ vinā phalaṁ.
anya-e0102n7:37_0: “Yathā na sūriye aggi, na maṇimhi na gomaye;
anya-e0102n7:38_0: Na tesaṁ bahi so atthi, sambhārehi ca jāyati.
anya-e0102n7:40_0: Bahiddhāpi na kammassa, na kammaṁ tattha vijjati.
anya-e0102n7:41_0: “Phalena suññaṁ taṁ kammaṁ, phalaṁ kamme na vijjati;
anya-e0102n7:42_0: Kammañca kho upādāya, tato nibbattate phalaṁ.
anya-e0102n7:45_1: Tassevaṁ kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭavasena nāmarūpassa paccayapariggahaṁ katvā tīsu addhāsu pahīnavicikicchassa
anya-e0102n7:46_3: atītakammapaccayā pana imasmiṁ bhave aññe nibbattā,
anya-e0102n7:46_4: atītabhavato imaṁ bhavaṁ āgato ekadhammopi natthi,
anya-e0102n7:46_5: imasmimpi bhave kammapaccayena nibbattā khandhā nirujjhissanti,
anya-e0102n7:46_7: imamhā bhavā punabbhavaṁ ekadhammopi na gamissati.
anya-e0102n7:46_8: Apica kho yathā na ācariyamukhato sajjhāyo antevāsikassa mukhaṁ pavisati,
anya-e0102n7:46_9: na ca tappaccayā tassa mukhe sajjhāyo na vattati,
anya-e0102n7:46_10: na dūtena mantodakaṁ pītaṁ rogino udaraṁ pavisati,
anya-e0102n7:46_11: na ca tassa tappaccayā rogo na vūpasammati,
anya-e0102n7:46_12: na mukhe maṇḍanavidhānaṁ ādāsatalādīsu mukhanimittaṁ gacchati,
anya-e0102n7:46_13: na ca tattha tappaccayā maṇḍanavidhānaṁ na paññāyati,
anya-e0102n7:46_14: na ekissā vaṭṭiyā dīpasikhā aññaṁ vaṭṭiṁ saṅkamati,
anya-e0102n7:46_15: na ca tattha tappaccayā dīpasikhā na nibbattati,
anya-e0102n7:46_17: ito vā punabbhavaṁ koci dhammo saṅkamati,
anya-e0102n7:46_19: idha vā khandhāyatanadhātupaccayā punabbhave khandhāyatanadhātuyo na nibbattantīti.
anya-e0102n7:48_0: Na ceva āgataṁ nāpi, na nibbattaṁ anantaraṁ.
anya-e0102n7:50_0: Purimaṁ bhijjate cittaṁ, pacchimaṁ jāyate tato.
anya-e0102n7:51_0: Tesaṁ antarikā natthi, vīci tesaṁ na vijjati;
anya-e0102n7:52_0: Na cito gacchati kiñci, paṭisandhi ca jāyatīti.
anya-e0102n7:53_1: Evaṁ cutipaṭisandhivasena viditasabbadhammassa sabbākārena nāmarūpassa paccayapariggahañāṇaṁ thāmagataṁ hoti,
anya-e0102n7:53_6: Evaṁ nānānayehi nāmarūpapaccayapariggahaṇena tīsu addhāsu kaṅkhaṁ vitaritvā ṭhitaṁ ñāṇaṁ kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhīti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n7:54_2: Ubhopete dhammā paccayasamuppannāti paccayapariggahe paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇa”nti.
anya-e0102n7:55_0: “Aniccato manasikaronto katame dhamme yathābhūtaṁ jānāti passati,
anya-e0102n7:55_2: kathaṁ tadanvayena sabbe saṅkhārā aniccato sudiṭṭhā honti,
anya-e0102n7:55_5: anattato manasikaronto katame dhamme yathābhūtaṁ jānāti passati…pe…
anya-e0102n7:56_2: Evaṁ tadanvayena sabbe saṅkhārā aniccato sudiṭṭhā honti.
anya-e0102n7:56_4: Dukkhato manasikaronto pavattaṁ yathābhūtaṁ jānāti passati…pe…
anya-e0102n7:56_5: anattato manasikaronto nimittañca pavattañca yathābhūtaṁ jānāti passati,
anya-e0102n7:56_7: Evaṁ tadanvayena sabbe dhammā anattato sudiṭṭhā honti.
anya-e0102n7:57_0: “Yañca yathābhūtañāṇaṁ yañca sammādassanaṁ yā ca kaṅkhāvitaraṇā,
anya-e0102n7:57_1: ime dhammā nānatthā ceva nānābyañjanā ca,
anya-e0102n7:57_3: Yañca yathābhūtañāṇaṁ yañca sammādassanaṁ yā ca kaṅkhāvitaraṇā,
anya-e0102n7:58_0: Iminā pana ñāṇena samannāgato vipassako buddhasāsane laddhassāso laddhapatiṭṭho niyatagatiko cūḷasotāpanno nāma hoti.
anya-e0102n7:59_0: Tasmā bhikkhu sadā sato, nāmarūpassa sabbaso;
